verses.verse: Then Solomon <S%H8010><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and all the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%>, the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, unto king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, to bring up <S%H5927><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, which is Zion <S%H6726><s%>.

And all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> themselves unto king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> at the feast <S%H2282><s%>, in the month <S%H3391><s%> Ethanim <S%H388><s%>, which is the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.
And all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>.

And they brought up <S%H5927><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and all the holy <S%H6944><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> that were in the Tent <S%H168><s%>; even these did the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> bring up <S%H5927><s%>.

And king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that were assembled <S%H3259><s%> unto him <S%H6440><s%>, were with him before the ark <S%H727><s%>, sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen <S%H1241><s%>, that could not be counted <S%H5608><s%> nor numbered <S%H4487><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>.

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> brought in <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto its place <S%H4725><s%>, into the oracle <S%H1687><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, to the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H3671><s%>, even under the wings of the cherubim <S%H3742><s%>.

For the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> spread forth <S%H6566><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> over the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%>, and the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> covered <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof above <S%H4605><s%>.

And the staves <S%H905><s%> were so long <S%H748><s%> that the ends <S%H7218><s%> of the staves <S%H905><s%> were seen from <S%H7200><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> place before <S%H6440><s%> the oracle <S%H1687><s%>; but they were not seen <S%H7200><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>: and there they are unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

There was nothing in the ark <S%H727><s%> save <S%H7535><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H3240><s%> there at Horeb <S%H2722><s%>, when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when they came out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3548><s%>, when the priests were come out <S%H3318><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H6051><s%>, that the cloud filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>,

so that the priests <S%H3548><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>; for the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Then spake <S%H559><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> that he would dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%>.
I have surely <S%H1129><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> thee a house <S%H1004><s%> of habitation <S%H2073><s%>, a place <S%H4349><s%> for thee to dwell in <S%H2073><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> about <S%H5437><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> all the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and all the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, who spake <S%H1696><s%> with his mouth <S%H6310><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%>, and hath with his hand <S%H3027><s%> fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> it <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Since the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, I chose <S%H977><s%> no city <S%H5892><s%> out of all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%>, that my name <S%H8034><s%> might be there <S%H977><s%>; but I chose David <S%H1732><s%> to be over my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Now it was in the heart <S%H3824><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, Whereas <S%H3282><s%> it was in thy heart <S%H3824><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%>, thou didst well <S%H2895><s%> that it was in thy heart <S%H3824><s%>:

nevertheless <S%H7535><s%> thou shalt not build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>; but thy son <S%H1121><s%> that shall come forth out <S%H3318><s%> of thy loins <S%H2504><s%>, he shall build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath established <S%H6965><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%> that he spake <S%H1696><s%>; for I am risen up <S%H6965><s%> in the room of David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, and sit <S%H3427><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> promised <S%H1696><s%>, and have built <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And there have I set <S%H7760><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for the ark <S%H727><s%>, wherein is the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which he made <S%H3772><s%> with our fathers <S%H1><s%>, when he brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the presence of <S%H5048><s%> all the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and spread forth <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> toward heaven <S%H8064><s%>;

and he said <S%H559><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, there is no God <S%H430><s%> like thee <S%H8064><s%>, in heaven above <S%H4605><s%>, or on earth <S%H776><s%> beneath <S%H8104><s%>; who keepest covenant <S%H1285><s%> and lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> with thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, that walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee with all their heart <S%H3820><s%>;

who hast kept <S%H8104><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> that which thou didst promise <S%H1696><s%> him <S%H1696><s%>: yea, thou spakest with thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and hast fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> it with thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Now therefore <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, keep <S%H8104><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> that which thou hast promised <S%H1696><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, saying, There shall not fail <S%H3772><s%> thee a man <S%H376><s%> in my sight <S%H6440><s%> to sit <S%H3427><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, if <S%H7535><s%> only thy children <S%H1121><s%> take heed <S%H8104><s%> to their way <S%H1870><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me as thou hast walked <S%H1980><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%>.

Now therefore <S%H430><s%>, O God of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, let thy word <S%H1697><s%>, I pray thee <S%H539><s%>, be verified, which thou spakest <S%H1696><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>.

But will God <S%H430><s%> in very deed <S%H552><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>? behold <S%H8064><s%>, heaven and the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%> cannot contain <S%H3557><s%> thee <S%H637><s%>; how much less this house <S%H1004><s%> that I have builded <S%H1129><s%>!

Yet have thou respect <S%H6437><s%> unto the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, and to his supplication <S%H8467><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, to hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the cry <S%H7440><s%> and to the prayer <S%H8605><s%> which thy servant <S%H5650><s%> prayeth <S%H6419><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>;

that thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> may be open <S%H6605><s%> toward this house <S%H1004><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> and day <S%H3117><s%>, even toward the place <S%H4725><s%> whereof thou hast said <S%H559><s%>, My name <S%H8034><s%> shall be there <S%H8085><s%>; to hearken unto the prayer <S%H8605><s%> which thy servant <S%H5650><s%> shall pray <S%H6419><s%> toward this place <S%H4725><s%>.

And hearken <S%H8085><s%> thou to the supplication <S%H8467><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, and of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when they shall pray <S%H6419><s%> toward this place <S%H4725><s%>: yea <S%H8085><s%>, hear thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> - place <S%H4725><s%>; and when thou hearest <S%H8085><s%>, forgive <S%H5545><s%>.

If a man <S%H376><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> against his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, and an oath <S%H423><s%> be laid <S%H5375><s%> upon him to cause him to swear <S%H422><s%>, and he come <S%H935><s%> and swear <S%H423><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thine altar <S%H4196><s%> in this house <S%H1004><s%>;

then hear <S%H8085><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%>, and judge <S%H8199><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, condemning <S%H7561><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, to bring <S%H5414><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> upon his own head <S%H7218><s%>, and justifying <S%H6663><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> him according to his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

When thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> are smitten down <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%>, because they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee <S%H7725><s%>; if they turn again to thee <S%H3034><s%>, and confess thy name <S%H8034><s%>, and pray <S%H6419><s%> and make supplication <S%H2603><s%> unto thee in this house <S%H1004><s%>:

then hear <S%H8085><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and forgive <S%H5545><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and bring them again <S%H7725><s%> unto the land <S%H127><s%> which thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

When heaven <S%H8064><s%> is shut up <S%H6113><s%>, and there is no rain <S%H4306><s%>, because they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee <S%H6419><s%>; if they pray toward this place <S%H4725><s%>, and confess <S%H3034><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>, and turn <S%H7725><s%> from their sin <S%H2403><s%>, when thou dost afflict them <S%H6031><s%>:

then hear <S%H8085><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and forgive <S%H5545><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, and of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when thou teachest <S%H3384><s%> them the good <S%H2896><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> wherein they should walk <S%H3212><s%>; and send <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> upon thy land <S%H776><s%>, which thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> to thy people <S%H5971><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

If there be in the land <S%H776><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%>, if there be pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, if there be blasting <S%H7711><s%> or mildew <S%H3420><s%>, locust <S%H697><s%> or caterpillar <S%H2625><s%>; if their enemy <S%H341><s%> besiege <S%H6887><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> of their cities <S%H8179><s%>; whatsoever plague <S%H5061><s%>, whatsoever sickness there be <S%H4245><s%>;

what prayer <S%H8605><s%> and supplication <S%H8467><s%> soever be made by any man <S%H120><s%>, or by all thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, who shall know <S%H3045><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> of his own heart <S%H3824><s%>, and spread forth <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> toward this house <S%H1004><s%>:

then hear <S%H8085><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> - place <S%H4349><s%>, and forgive <S%H5545><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%>, and render <S%H5414><s%> unto every man <S%H376><s%> according to all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, whose heart <S%H3824><s%> thou knowest <S%H3045><s%>; (for thou <S%H3045><s%>, even thou only, knowest the hearts <S%H3824><s%> of all the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>;)
that they may fear <S%H3372><s%> thee all the days <S%H3117><s%> that they live <S%H2416><s%> in <S%H6440><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%>.

Moreover concerning the foreigner <S%H5237><s%>, that is not of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when he shall come out <S%H935><s%> of a far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%> for <S%H4616><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake

(for they shall hear <S%H8085><s%> of thy great <S%H1419><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, and of thy mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and of thine outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>); when he shall come <S%H935><s%> and pray <S%H6419><s%> toward this house <S%H1004><s%>;

hear <S%H8085><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> - place <S%H4349><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> according to all that the foreigner <S%H5237><s%> calleth <S%H7121><s%> to thee for <S%H5971><s%>; that all the peoples of the earth <S%H776><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>, to fear <S%H3372><s%> thee <S%H5971><s%>, as doth thy people Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and that they may know <S%H3045><s%> that this house <S%H1004><s%> which I have built <S%H1129><s%> is called <S%H7121><s%> by my name <S%H8034><s%>.

If thy people <S%H5971><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against their enemy <S%H341><s%>, by whatsoever <S%H1870><s%> way thou shalt send <S%H7971><s%> them <S%H6419><s%>, and they pray unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> which thou hast chosen <S%H977><s%>, and toward the house <S%H1004><s%> which I have built <S%H1129><s%> for thy name <S%H8034><s%>;
then hear <S%H8085><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> their prayer <S%H8605><s%> and their supplication <S%H8467><s%>, and maintain <S%H6213><s%> their cause <S%H4941><s%>.

If they sin <S%H2398><s%> against thee <S%H120><s%> (for there is no man that sinneth <S%H2398><s%> not <S%H599><s%>), and thou be angry with them <S%H5414><s%>, and deliver them to the enemy <S%H341><s%>, so that they carry them away <S%H7617><s%> captive <S%H7617><s%> unto <S%H6440><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>, far <S%H7350><s%> off or near <S%H7138><s%>;

yet if they shall bethink <S%H7725><s%> themselves in the land <S%H776><s%> whither they are carried captive <S%H7617><s%>, and turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H2603><s%>, and make supplication unto thee in the land <S%H776><s%> of them that carried them captive <S%H7617><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, We have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and have done perversely <S%H5753><s%>, we have dealt wickedly <S%H7561><s%>;

if they return <S%H7725><s%> unto thee with all their heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all their soul <S%H5315><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>, who carried them captive <S%H7617><s%>, and pray <S%H6419><s%> unto thee toward <S%H1870><s%> their land <S%H776><s%>, which thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>, the city <S%H5892><s%> which thou hast chosen <S%H977><s%>, and the house <S%H1004><s%> which I have built <S%H1129><s%> for thy name <S%H8034><s%>:

then hear <S%H8085><s%> thou their prayer <S%H8605><s%> and their supplication <S%H8467><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> - place <S%H4349><s%>, and maintain <S%H6213><s%> their cause <S%H4941><s%>;

and forgive <S%H5545><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> who have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee <S%H6588><s%>, and all their transgressions wherein they have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against thee <S%H5414><s%>; and give them compassion <S%H7356><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> those who carried them captive <S%H7617><s%>, that they may have compassion on them <S%H7355><s%>

(for they are thy people <S%H5971><s%>, and thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which thou broughtest forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>);

that thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> may be open <S%H6605><s%> unto the supplication <S%H8467><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, and unto the supplication <S%H8467><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto them whensoever they cry unto thee <S%H7121><s%>.

For thou didst separate <S%H914><s%> them from among all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, to be thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as thou spakest <S%H1696><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, when thou broughtest <S%H3318><s%> our fathers <S%H1><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>.
